main event: Three egg-shaped objects with cone-shaped tails were sighted in West Germany on 7 September 1957.
interesting points: The objects were estimated to be 5 meters in diameter,The first two objects were observed heading 90° and 270° respectively,The third object exhibited an arcing trajectory before disappearing suddenly,All witnesses agreed on the color and shape of the objects,No sound was reported during the sighting.
sighted object: three egg-shaped fireballs with cone-shaped tails
witness description: Four Tank Depot Guards, located as far as 700 yards apart
